title: 13. IRRI Agronomy Challenge: Chemical Reactions in Flooded Soils (21 February 2012)

tasks.task: Analyze soil chemistry in flooded fields
subtasks: Examine the layering of soil sections
Identify oxidized and reduced soil layers
Interpret the presence of iron compounds
Understand microbial processes in anaerobic soil
Recognize the role of roots in soil health
Observe and describe biological activity in soil layers
